title: Leukemia & Lymphoma
text:
Leukemia & Lymphoma is a <a href="Peer%20review">peer-reviewed</a> <a href="medical%20journal">medical journal</a> published by <a href="Informa%20Healthcare">Informa Healthcare</a>. It covers basic and clinical aspects of hematologic malignancies (<a href="leukemia">leukemia</a>s and <a href="lymphoma">lymphoma</a>s). The <a href="editors-in-chief">editors-in-chief</a> are Aaron Polliack (<a href="Hadassah%20Medical%20Center">Hadassah University Hospital</a>), Koen Van Besien (<a href="Weill%20Cornell%20Medical%20Center">Weill Cornell Medical Center</a>), and John Seymour (<a href="Peter%20MacCallum%20Cancer%20Centre">Peter MacCallum Cancer Centre</a>).
Abstracting and indexing.
The journal is abstracted and indexed in:
According to the "<a href="Journal%20Citation%20Reports">Journal Citation Reports</a>", the journal has a 2014 <a href="impact%20factor">impact factor</a> of 2.891.
